item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德与卡塔尔 Qai 成立 200 亿美元合资公司，建设人工智能基础设施
item.description: 布鲁克菲尔德（Brookfield）和卡塔尔人工智能公司 Qai 周二宣布了一项战略投资，将成立一家 200 亿美元的合资企业，专注于人工智能基础设施。【原文：Brookfield and Qatar's AI company Qai on Tuesday announced a strategic investment to establish a $20 billion joint venture focused on artificial intelligence infrastructure.】

item.title: 特朗普允许向中国销售部分人工智能芯片，英伟达股价上涨
item.description: 英伟达（Nvidia）股价周二在美国股市盘前交易中上涨 1.7%，此前美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）表示，他将允许英伟达向获得批准的中国客户销售其 H200 芯片，从而缓解了市场对英伟达进入其最大市场之一的担忧。【原文：Nvidia shares rose 1.7% in U.S. premarket trading on Tuesday after President Donald Trump said he will allow the sale of its H200 chips to approved Chinese customers, easing concerns over access to one of its biggest markets.】

item.title: 笛卡尔系统公司：中国需求下滑，美国11月集装箱进口下降7.8
item.description: 供应链技术供应商笛卡尔系统集团（Descartes Systems Group）周二表示，由于对中国商品的需求疲软以及感恩节假期少一天，11月份美国集装箱进口量同比下降了7.8%。【原文：U.S. container imports fell 7.8% in November from the year earlier, due to soft demand for goods from China and one less day in the Thanksgiving holiday month, supply chain technology provider Descartes Systems Group said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 印度人工智能专利费提案针对 OpenAI 和谷歌的数据实践
item.description: 印度政府的一个小组提议，要求人工智能公司在使用内容创作者的作品训练模型时，向其支付一定比例的收入。【原文：An Indian government panel has proposed requiring AI companies to pay content creators a share of revenue for using their work to train models.】

item.title: 国际航空运输协会称明年全球航空公司净利润将达到创纪录的 410 亿美元
item.description: 全球航空贸易机构国际航空运输协会（IATA）周二表示，尽管供应链问题持续存在，导致飞机交付速度放缓，更省油的喷气式飞机也推迟推出，但航空业明年的利润仍将创下历史新高。【原文：Global airlines trade body IATA said on Tuesday the airline sector would post record profits next year despite ongoing supply chain issues leading to slower aircraft deliveries and a delay in rolling out more fuel-efficient jets.】

item.title: 国际航空运输协会首席执行官沃尔什称波音交付业绩改善，对空客信心不足
item.description: 全球航空机构国际航空运输协会（IATA）负责人周二表示，在供应链问题持续存在的情况下，人们对空中客车公司实现飞机交付目标的信心下降，而波音公司的表现则有所改善。【原文：The head of the global airlines body IATA on Tuesday said that there was less confidence in Airbus meeting aircraft delivery targets, while Boeing's performance has improved, amid ongoing supply chain issues.】

item.title: 宝马任命米兰-内德利科维奇（Milan Nedeljkovic）接替奥利弗-齐普瑟（Oliver Zipse）担任首席执行官
item.description: BWM 监事会周二任命米兰-内德利科维奇（Milan Nedeljkovic）为这家德国汽车制造商的新任首席执行官，任期自 2026 年 5 月 14 日起。【原文：BWM's supervisory board on Tuesday appointed Milan Nedeljkovic as the German carmaker's new CEO with effect from May 14, 2026 as the carmaker launches a new generation of models in a tough market environment.】

item.title: 对冲基金管理合伙人德米特里-巴利亚斯尼认为人工智能是 2026 年最大的尾部风险
item.description: 对冲基金巴利亚斯尼资产管理公司（Balyasny Asset Management）的执行合伙人周二表示，未来一年最大的尾部风险是人工智能是否会出现意外的上行或下行。【原文：Hedge fund Balyasny Asset Management's managing partner said on Tuesday that the largest tail risk for the year ahead is if artificial intelligence surprises on the upside or the downside.】

item.title: 人工智能需求推动台湾 11 月出口实现 15 年半以来最快增长
item.description: 由于进入年底后全球对台湾芯片和人工智能（AI）技术的需求依然强劲，台湾 11 月份的出口增长超过预期，并创下了 15 年半以来的最快增速。【原文：Taiwan's exports grew more than expected and logged their fastest growth in 15-1/2 years in November, as worldwide demand for the island's chips and artificial intelligence (AI) technology remained robust heading into the end of the year.】

item.title: 对冲基金和国家支持的投资者押注 2026 年的波动性
item.description: 对冲基金 Man Group 和 Brevan Howard 的负责人以及阿布扎比投资委员会（Abu Dhabi Investment Council）的首席投资人周二表示，地缘政治紧张局势和利率分化引发的市场动荡为来年带来了赚钱机会。【原文：Markets roiled by geopolitical tensions and diverging interest rates present money-making opportunities for the coming year, the heads of hedge funds Man Group and Brevan Howard and the Abu Dhabi Investment Council's chief investor said on Tuesday.】

item.title: Blackstone 的 Schwarzman 淡化了对私人信贷破产的担忧
item.description: Blackstone 首席执行官 Stephen Schwarzman 周二表示，他并不认同市场对与近期汽车行业破产有关的私人信贷的担忧。【原文：Blackstone CEO Stephen Schwarzman said on Tuesday that he did not share market concerns over private credit relating to recent bankruptcies in the autos sector.】

item.title: 美国货币市场基金在美联储决议前迎来大量资金流入
item.description: 截至12月3日的一周里，美国投资者向货币市场基金投入了大量资金，同时从风险较高的股票基金撤资，在美联储周三做出政策决定之前采取了谨慎的立场。【原文：U.S. investors poured large sums into money market funds while pulling back from riskier equity funds in the week to December 3, taking a cautious stance ahead of the Federal Reserve's policy decision on Wednesday.】

item.title: 欧盟对谷歌将网络内容用于人工智能目的展开反垄断调查
item.description: 欧盟委员会表示，它担心谷歌可能利用网络出版商的内容在其搜索结果页面上生成人工智能驱动的服务，而没有对出版商进行适当补偿。【原文：The European Commission said it was concerned Google may have used content from web publishers to generate AI-powered services on its search results pages without appropriate compensation to publishers.】

item.title: Stellantis 与 Bolt 合作在欧洲进行 2026 年无人驾驶打车试验
item.description: 汽车制造商Stellantis与爱沙尼亚打车平台Bolt周二表示，双方将联手在欧洲部署无人驾驶汽车，并计划于2026年开始上路测试。【原文：Carmaker Stellantis is teaming up with Estonia-based ride-hailing platform Bolt to deploy driverless vehicles across Europe, with plans to begin on-road trials in 2026, the companies said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 福特将利用雷诺技术和工厂生产更便宜的欧洲电动汽车，以抵御中国竞争对手
item.description: 雷诺汽车公司周二表示，将与福特汽车联合开发面向欧洲市场的小型廉价电动汽车，还将联手生产商用货车，以降低成本，抵御中国竞争对手日益激烈的竞争。【原文：Renault will jointly develop small, cheaper electric vehicles for Ford for the European market and will also team up to produce commercial vans to cut costs and fend off rising competition from Chinese rivals, the companies said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 据 Nieuwsuur 报道，ASML 的客户中至少有一家与中国军方有联系
item.description: 据荷兰电视节目 Nieuwsuur 周二报道，芯片设备制造商 ASML 的客户中至少包括一家与中国军方有关联的公司。【原文：Customers of chip equipment maker ASML include at least one firm with links to the Chinese military, Dutch television program Nieuwsuur reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 早间竞价几乎是美联储日，市场焦虑不安
item.description: 安库尔-班纳吉（Ankur Banerjee）对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee】

item.title: 聚变能源产业向美国政府施压，要求提供数十亿美元支持
item.description: 聚变能源行业的领导者们周一会见了美国能源部官员，敦促他们为寻求通过太阳发电的项目提供数十亿美元的便利。【原文：Fusion energy industry leaders met with U.S. Department of Energy officials on Monday to urge them to facilitate billions of dollars for projects seeking to generate electricity by the process that powers the sun.】

item.title: 比特币 2025 年的过山车可能以低点结束
item.description: 比特币是世界上最大的加密货币，2025 年比特币的走势就像坐过山车一样，接连创下历史新高和惨遭抛售，今年有可能出现自 2022 年以来的首次年度下跌。【原文：With a series of record highs and crushing sell-offs, 2025 has been a rollercoaster ride for bitcoin, the world's largest cryptocurrency, which is at risk of ending the year with its first annual decline since 2022.】

item.title: 全球飞行员警告印度豁免 IndiGo 的休息规定引发安全担忧
item.description: 全球飞行员工会组织 IFALPA 的负责人表示，由于疲劳对安全的不利影响，印度最大的航空公司在航班取消潮之后放松对飞行员休息的更严格规定的决定应予以撤销。【原文：India's decision to ease stricter rules on pilot rest following a wave of flight cancellations by the country's largest carrier should be reversed due to the adverse effect of fatigue on safety, the head of global pilot union group IFALPA said.】

item.title: 从澳大利亚到欧洲，各国开始限制儿童接触社交媒体
item.description: 澳大利亚周三将成为世界上第一个禁止 16 岁以下儿童使用社交媒体的国家，禁止他们使用包括 TikTok、Alphabet 旗下 YouTube 以及 Meta 旗下 Instagram 和 Facebook 在内的平台。【原文：Australia on Wednesday will become the world's first country to ban social media for children under 16, blocking them from platforms including TikTok, Alphabet's YouTube and Meta's Instagram and Facebook.】

item.title: 澳大利亚社交媒体禁令即将生效，引发全球打击热潮
item.description: 澳大利亚将于本周三成为第一个实施社交媒体最低使用年龄的国家，Instagram、TikTok 和 YouTube 等平台将被迫封停 100 多万个账户，这标志着预期中的全球监管浪潮的开始。【原文：Australia is set to become the first country to implement a minimum age for social media use on Wednesday, with platforms like Instagram, TikTok and YouTube forced to block more than a million accounts, marking the beginning of an expected global wave of regulation.】

item.title: 文件称，华纳兄弟缺乏回应助长了派拉蒙的恶意竞购
item.description: 周一提交的一份证券文件显示，派拉蒙 Skydance 在第 11 个小时以 1,084 亿美元的价格恶意竞购华纳兄弟 Discovery 公司，其根本原因是该公司认为华纳兄弟公司对其上周晚些时候的热情示好缺乏回应。【原文：Paramount Skydance's 11th-hour, hostile $108.4 billion bid for Warner Bros Discovery was rooted in what it considered a lack of responsiveness from Warner Bros to its ardent overtures late last week, a securities filing on Monday showed.】

item.title: 亚洲股市下滑，市场紧张等待美联储
item.description: 周二，亚洲股市下跌，美元持稳，投资者为本周晚些时候的美国降息做准备，而日元在日本东北部地区发生强烈地震后表现平静，但影响有限。【原文：Asian stocks fell and the dollar was steady on Tuesday as investors braced for a cut in U.S. interest rates later this week while the yen was calm after a powerful earthquake rocked Japan's northeast region though the impact was limited.】

item.title: 估值飙升，Aware 超级首席信息官警告人工智能融资将亮起 "橙色 "灯
item.description: 澳大利亚养老基金 Aware Super 的首席投资官表示，全球人工智能行业的一些资金安排闪烁着 "橙色 "灯光，但盈利增长支持了该行业目前的估值。【原文：The chief investment officer of Australian pension fund Aware Super says there are flashing "orange" lights in some funding arrangements in the global artificial intelligence industry but earnings growth is backing up the sector's current valuations.】

item.title: 必和必拓与 GIP 就 WAIO 电网达成 20 亿美元基础设施融资协议
item.description: 必和必拓集团（BHP Group）周二表示，贝莱德（BlackRock）旗下的全球基础设施基金（GIP）将向西澳大利亚铁矿公司（WAIO）的内陆电力网络投资 20 亿澳元，获得少数股权。【原文：BHP Group said on Tuesday that BlackRock -owned Global Infrastructure Fund (GIP) would invest $2 billion in Western Australia Iron Ore's (WAIO) inland power network for a minority stake.】

item.title: 石油价格稳定，乌克兰和谈与美国利率决议成为焦点
item.description: 由于市场参与者密切关注结束俄罗斯乌克兰战争的和平谈判以及迫在眉睫的美国利率决定，油价在上一交易日下跌2%后于周二企稳。【原文：Oil prices steadied on Tuesday after slipping 2% in the previous session, as market participants kept a close eye on peace talks to end Russia’s war in Ukraine and a looming decision on U.S. interest rates.】

item.title: 美国司法部指控两名中国男子试图走私 Nvidia 芯片
item.description: 美国司法部周一表示，两名中国男子因涉嫌向中国走私英伟达（Nvidia）H100 和 H200 芯片而被拘留，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）为英伟达（Nvidia）向中国出口 H200 芯片开了绿灯。【原文：Two Chinese men are in custody for allegedly smuggling Nvidia H100 and H200 chips to China, the U.S. Justice Department said on Monday, as President Donald Trump gave the green light for Nvidia to export its H200 chips to Beijing.】

item.title: 日元在日本地震后表现坚挺，美联储和澳大利亚央行备受关注
item.description: 隔夜日本东北部发生 7.5 级强烈地震后，日元在亚洲早盘交易中持稳，在包括美联储在内的几家央行做出政策决定之前，风险情绪进一步升温。【原文：The yen held steady in early Asian trading after a powerful 7.5-magnitude earthquake struck Japan's northeast overnight, adding to a risk-off mood ahead of several policy decisions from central banks including the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 美国 FDA 批准首个人工智能工具用于加速肝病药物开发
item.description: 美国食品和药物管理局（U.S. Food and Drug Administration）周一表示，该机构已对首个人工智能工具进行了鉴定，该工具旨在帮助医生在药物试验中评估一种严重的脂肪肝。【原文：The U.S. Food and Drug Administration has qualified the first artificial intelligence tool designed to help doctors assess a severe form of fatty liver disease in drug trials, the agency said on Monday.】
